alert.note: Alert for Cobb; Douglas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 30 at 3:57PM EST until December 31 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Georgia... Sweetwater Creek near Austell affecting Douglas and Cobb Counties. For the Sweetwater Creek...including Austell...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sweetwater Creek near Austell. * WHEN...Until tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 15 feet, Significant flooding continues in the woodlands and fields upstream and downstream from the gage by the Interstate 20 bridge. Portions of a paintball playing field just downstream of the bridge and athletic fields in the Woodrow Wilson Park on Mount Vernon Road are flooded with 4 to 5 feet of water. Several homes on Wren Circle and Robin Road and portions of Brook Forest and Beech Gum Mobile Home Parks in Douglas County, and Sunlight Drive and Old Marietta Road in Cobb County will be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:45 PM EST Thursday the stage was 9.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 15 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage Friday evening. - Flood stage is 10 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
